Package io.github.mbenincasa.javaexcelutils.annotations

Annotation Interface ExcelBodyStyle

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) public @interface ExcelBodyStyle
This annotation defines the style of the Excel file body when converting a list of objects to an Excel file
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
Mirko Benincasa

  • Element Details

    • cellColor

      org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.IndexedColors cellColor
      Returns:
      the background color of the cell. The default is IndexedColors.GREY_25_PERCENT
      Default:
      GREY_25_PERCENT

    • horizontal

      org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.HorizontalAlignment horizontal
      Returns:
      the horizontal orientation of the text in the cell. The default is HorizontalAlignment.LEFT
      Default:
      LEFT

    • vertical

      org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.VerticalAlignment vertical
      Returns:
      the vertical orientation of the text in the cell. The default is VerticalAlignment.TOP
      Default:
      TOP
